page.title: 08PRIMARY SCHOOL_EPPERSTONE
page.content: The school has 14 children on roll.{ {Staff}include head_teacher,a part_time assistant teacher,cook,caretaker and secretary.Education caters for the age range 4_11 of mixed ability.The school has close links with nearby Lowdham Primary and Calverton Comprehensive school where they often attend or participate in concerts.Parents help to broaden the childrens experience by providing transport for outside{visits This month the children travel to London and York.Such a small school has limited opportunities for organized{games.}The children use the playground and playing field for their own imaginative play.Huge logs on the field are a popular play area,one of them is fondly known as"the elephant". The school closes at the end of July,a sad loss to the village.
